data.prayer: Father, we ask for 59 new simple churches in the state of Jinotega, Nicaragua. Place a simple church in every community of the 297,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jinotega, Nicaragua
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, provide a good translation of the Bible for the 127,610 believers in Jinotega, Nicaragua.
Father, bring yourself glory in Jinotega. Through your servants plant 59 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 127,610 believers find a person of peace today among the 169,691 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 127,610 believers in the state of Jinotega to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, the believers in the state of Jinotega, Nicaragua need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jinotega, Nicaragua has a population of 297,300.

We estimate Jinotega has 127,610 people who might know Jesus, 158,331 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 11,360 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Jinotega, Nicaragua to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.
